feature_model.name: FeatureIDE model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Eclipse(Eclipse) :o JDT(JDT) :o CDT(CDT) :o AJDT(AJDT) :o FeatureModeling(FeatureModeling) :o CIDE(CIDE) :o FAMILIAR(FAMILIAR) :o FeatureIDE(FeatureIDE) :g [1,*] : AHEAD(AHEAD) : FeatureHouse(FeatureHouse) : FeatureCpp(FeatureCpp) : DeltaJ(DeltaJ) : AspectJ(AspectJ) : Munge(Munge) : Antenna(Antenna) : DeltaMontiArc(DeltaMontiArc) :o ExtendedFM(ExtendedFM) :o MoSoPoLiTe(MoSoPoLiTe) :o DeltaJEclipsePlugin(DeltaJEclipsePlugin)
feature_model.constraints: C1:~AHEAD or JDT C2:~FeatureHouse or JDT C3:JDT or ~Munge C4:~Antenna or JDT C5:CDT or ~FeatureCpp C6:AJDT or ~AspectJ C7:~DeltaJ or DeltaJEclipsePlugin
